title: Convert String to Array
description: In this lab, we will explore how to convert a given string into an array of words using JavaScript. We will use the String.prototype.split() method to split the string and the Array.prototype.filter() method to remove any empty strings. By the end of the lab, you will have a better understanding of how to manipulate strings in JavaScript and extract meaningful data from them.
